00044 #define PVNETWORKADDRESS_LEN 50
00045 
00046 class OsclNetworkAddress
00047 {
00048     public:
00049         OsclNetworkAddress(): port(0)
00050         {
00051         }
00052         OsclNetworkAddress(const char *addr, int p)
00053         {
00054             ipAddr.Set(addr);
00055             port = p;
00056         }
00057 
00058         //Network address in dotted decimal string format.
00059         OsclNameString<PVNETWORKADDRESS_LEN> ipAddr;
00060 
00061         //Port number.
00062         int     port;
00063         //@cmember equality comparison operator
00064         bool operator == (const OsclNetworkAddress & rhs) const
00065         {
00066             if (port == rhs.port)
00067             {
00068                 if (0 == oscl_strcmp((const char*)ipAddr.Str(), (const char*)rhs.ipAddr.Str()))
00069                     return true;
00070             }
00071             return false;
00072         };
00073 
00074 } ;
